data.description:
arrowhead / counterbalance recommended
really good despite lightweight damage model
blunt execution rounds lets you do the halo ce B->X->R (melee -> kill with br)
you can max out any relevant stat with ele. capacitor
recommended mw: range or handling
data.name: pvp

data.description:
it's a kinetic so there's no disruption break, which greatly diminishes this thing's value as a gl. the right column is pretty much entirely a bust. you can blint with an energy weapon, which is nice, but it's far from good.
recommended mw: handling or velocity
data.name: pvp

data.description:
it's a kinetic so there's no disruption break, which greatly diminishes this thing's value as a gl. the right column is pretty much entirely a bust. you can blint with an energy weapon, which is nice, but it's far from good.

data.name: god-pvp

data.description:
honestly i'd take this thing over ignition code for high level content, which is primarily where you're going to be using a gl. it's not as good for dps (nothing can beat slideshot), but autoloading provides way more utility when you're not moving as much for blinding.
recommended mw: velocity
data.name: pve
